column4: Latest;Kratie province: According to Heng Ratana
column8: Kratie province found a massive bomb.------Heng Ratana said the UXO weighed 340 kg and was a 444 CBU-46 (*cluster munitions from Vietnam war).------CMAC forces
column9: with the participation of police and local authorities
column10: have safely pulled the bomb out of the water. ------KBN
